oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Family Bible of the Benjamin Price Wright family
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Benjamin Price Wright was born in Virigina but moved to Gibson County, Tennessee before the war. When Virginia seceeded he returned to his native state and joined the 40th Va. Inf. Regt., CSA. He returned to Gibson County after the Civil War. The family Bible records much of the family history. For more information on Benjamin Price Wright see [wmca 158].
